description: This is Marc's first porn experience. This 22 year old dude really likes anything that has to do with motors (motocross, four wheeler, going to the race track...). He has a nice ripped body. It shows that he works out 6 times a week. I personally think that his body looks like a younger Criss Strokes. Even if Marc says that his most complimented body part is his ass, I would say that his large 9 uncut cock is pretty awesome. So I'm really glad he chose Maskurbate to make his porn debut. I'm pretty sure we'll see plenty of Marc in years to come! Welcome to the industry young man!
title: Marc, Scene #01
